website_summaries.verdict: The Adidas Speed Trainer 3 feels like it’s been made for the narrow-footed baseballer. Patrons praise the pair’s comfort as well as fit. It also did not hurt that the shoe’s price falls within the regular price range. It’s also been suggested that this baseball model works as great as everyday sneakers and even as gym trainers.
pros: Most of the wearers of the Adidas Speed Trainer 3 reported that while the pair brings an initially snug fit, the shoe becomes more comfortable as the pair is adequately broken in
This baseball shoe has a decent fit, says a significant number of reviewers
A handful of commenters raved about this baseball shoe’s overall look and style
The grip of this Speed Trainer is excellent says many reviewers
Several reviewers say that this Trainer is light
A number of patrons point out that they have been buying and will continue to buy releases from the Adidas Speed Trainer line
Some users say that the third Speed Trainers from Adidas can serve not only as great workout shoes but also as everyday shoes
The price of this Adidas baseball cleat belongs to the regular or usual range
cons: One of the most prevalent feedback from reviewers is that this pair is narrow-fitting
so, getting this model might not be ideal for broad-footed players
A few say that the third version of the Adidas Speed Trainer could use a bit of improvement in the heel area as it tends to cause slippage

customer_reviews.title: Amazing looking/feeling, weird heel cup
customer_reviews.text: I want to give them a 5, but they have a weird heel cup with padding over the heel's location meaning that they have little padding around the inside of the cup but padding over the cup around the ankle. It's not bad, just a little weird and takes a little to get used to. BUT, they are great looking! They have great grip. Great support!
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: Not a trainer, but a baseball shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable athletic shoe, but it is not a 'trainer'. The box is labeled as a baseball shoe; hence I wouldn't recommend long runs, or even sprinted on them, but will work for you with any other sport activities. If you're activity involves watching sports on the couch, they are pretty snazzy. If you're a fan of a maroon team, they are an attention-getter.
customer_reviews.author: Guido Sarduchi

customer_reviews.title: Walking in comfort.
customer_reviews.text: A very good shoe. Room in the toe for my wide foot but the heel is tight enough to be comfortable and secure. The heels are well padded and great for walking or street jogging. The shoe is attractive and because of the dark "zinfandel" red I can get away with them at times and places not usually considered tennis shoe places. Good buy and a good seller. Here on time as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: BEST SHOE PURCHASE EVER!
customer_reviews.text: OMG I have bought 6 pair of Adidas shoes for my son since December and these are by far his favorite. The color is deep and masculine so that adds to the appeal I think. He said they are super comfy and has been asked many times at school where he bought them. Great shoe that I highly recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit as expected.
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 9 in this type of shoe. I got a 9 and it was significantly smaller. I decided not to keep this shoe in a larger size because I didn’t like the hard synthetic material around the outsider of the heel. The shoes were comfortable; however you really can’t see this “guard-like” shield on the heel.of the shoe until you have the shoes on your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer FRJ

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoes that were a Catch on Sale
customer_reviews.text: I must be honest and say I bought these shoes because I like Adidas shoes and it was on sale. When they got here a little later than I thought they fit great the shoe strings are a little squirrley between the red and the whites it looks like a peppermint stick. But so far they’ve cleaned up easily and look pretty sharp. I’m very Happy with the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: James P. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoes but Mis-Labeled
customer_reviews.text: The title of this shoe is misleading. This is a kids size shoe, not “men’s”. That said, the shoe is well made and fits my 11 yo just perfectly. It looks like a running shoe but is less cushioned than one. It’s really a cross-training shoe.
customer_reviews.author: GMa

customer_reviews.title: Great sneakers. The 8 1/2 fits the same as ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sneakers. The 8 1/2 fits the same as Nike sneakers, which are my usual go-to. These Adidas seem very high in quality. Cool red color! If you click your heels you may be able to get a free trip to Kansas!
customer_reviews.author: Iorek McPantaloons

customer_reviews.title: Amazing gym shoes! (But get 1/2 bigger)
customer_reviews.text: These are simply fantastic gym shoes that work really well on elipptical, ARC, trademill and lifting. The only issue with them is that they run a bit small. But for their price you can't go wrong
customer_reviews.author: SBS

customer_reviews.title: Fits large
customer_reviews.text: My son really liked these. While some sites list them as a cross trainer for baseball, he planned on using these for tennis. There is a lot of lateral support on them. While the heal looks contoured and like it would be tight, his heal slipped in it. We couldn't get them to fit. I thought he might grow into them but he didn't and I missed the return window. They also seem to be a little bigger than the other Addidas shoes he has purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Tim McHugh

customer_reviews.title: Do not last long
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son, returned the 1st pair because the pull tab in the back came off after a week. Same thing happened with this pair and after 2 months there are holes in the shoes and the color is rubbing off the shoes. He doesnt even wear these every day. There is definitely a better option than these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: A. Nahn

customer_reviews.title: Shoe design causes over pronation
customer_reviews.text: These look good and are comfortable, but their sole design is off a bit. It causes you to step on the outside of your foot and roll into the inside (probation). This can lead to knee problems in the long term. I find that I really have to focus on a proper step to avoid this issue. It’s odd, and I’ve never had an adidas shoe do this. They’re nice otherwise
customer_reviews.author: Scott W

customer_reviews.title: Gig 'em, Aggies!
customer_reviews.text: Every year, I buy the new sideline shoes to show my support of the Texas A&M Aggies. Adidas is cranking out great shoes right now and these are no exception. Very comfortable for long days - yes, I get to wear these to work - good construction, good fit, and a striking appearance. My shoes are so popular at the office, that my boss even ordered a pair! Thanks and Gig 'em, Adidas!
customer_reviews.author: Michael G Ethridge

customer_reviews.title: Flashy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: For minor exercise and work-outs, this is prefect for me. Took some time to break them in, but they fit well now. Adidas are a nice fit for me, Nike runs too narrow. For some reason, the super bright red was a bargain option on Amazon, but I like color!
customer_reviews.author: BostonLFC

customer_reviews.title: Cool but...
customer_reviews.text: They have this weird cushion on the back inside of the shoe that makes it feel like my foot isn't all the way in the shoe. I guess if I went up a half a size it wouldn't be an issue but for now it is. Update: I wore them for a few hours and now I love them. Probably going to buy different colors as well
customer_reviews.author: Preppy

customer_reviews.title: I usually like to try them on
customer_reviews.text: This was the first time I'd ever bought shoes over the internet. I usually like to try them on. I was concerned about the corrent amount of toe space, which turned out to be fine. Only problem was that the heels are not as snug as I'd like; I have rather narrow heels.
customer_reviews.author: G. Viney

customer_reviews.title: Terrible fit compared to my other Adidas running shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have always preferred Adidas shoes for their wide width and toe box. When I saw these shoes, I was hoping for a minimal soled shoe, but it is a bit misleading in that the heel padding is considerable. When I tried these on for the first time I thought I had put them on the wrong feet like a toddler. It felt like the arch support was on the outer edges of my feet and the heel cup felt like it was turned the wrong way giving me blisters. I had hoped that they needed to be broken in and gave them multiple test runs, and unfortunately kept them beyond the time allowable to return.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Not great for Wide Feet
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son, who has some really big and wide feet. Size 15 was great, but width was a little too narrow for him. Ended up returning because of that and looking for a shoe that offers a little more width. It it wasn't for that, would give a higher rating. Nothing really wrong with the shoe itself, and it would likely work well for your typical foot width.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Too low on heel
customer_reviews.text: The snickers look great but they do not come up high enough in the heal, you cannot we’re tennis socks with these as they will pull the socks down. I have never worn a sneaker that fit quite like this, it’s disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: DB Medway

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last long...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son for Christmas. He has wore them for about a week before the loop on the back of one of the shoes came apart. I expected them to last a Little longer than that! The all black color is good, fit was true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Heal blister
customer_reviews.text: Heal cup not for me. I wore them and didn't like the fit. On my first day got a blister on the back of my heal. It also felt like the arch support area wasn't properly aligned. These shoes were an attempt to try something other than New Balance. I requested a return the same day I received. There was no chance at breaking these in to the comfort level I desire.
customer_reviews.author: jman

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Cross Training Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought for Boot camp/CrossFit classes. Good, stable platform. Works well for running short distances, jumping, lifting. Slightly snug but probably by design. A bit pricey but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son who has problems with foot pain. He told me these are great, fit well and are comfortable for him to go for long walks or use at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: They have good arch support as I have found with Adidas in ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid shoe. I normally have to wear inserts but not with these. They have good arch support as I have found with Adidas in general. Being a cross trainer shoe, they are not cushy like a running shoe, but I have found I can wear them all day. They have solid side to side stability like a basketball or tennis shoe. I will buy other colors. I bought the navy silver combo which I like and they were under $60. The bummer is I want the gray silver combo but they are $20 more.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Has held up well
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 9 year old boy who is usually thought on shoes. These have held up well. The laces run on the undersides of the sides which makes the laces difficult to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: A horrible material, super uncomfortable and it hurts your ankle ...
customer_reviews.text: A horrible material, super uncomfortable and it hurts your ankle without even having to run, walking will make you cringe. Just bad shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Maddy

customer_reviews.title: These are the most painful sneakers I've ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: These are the most painful sneakers I've ever purchased! I have been wearing them for 2 months now and they still don't feel broken in and to top it off the back of my heel on the right shoe is ripping apart I'm calling Amazon to see if they can help me deal with this.
customer_reviews.author: Demetri Rinaldi

customer_reviews.title: Cool Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Excellent walking shoe, very comfortable and supportive. They are very good looking and keep my feet cool during a long walk.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Benson

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable shoe in the heel area.
customer_reviews.text: I've worn these shoes about 20 times now and just can't seem to break them in. They are uncomfortable in the heel area as the heel portion of the shoe is hard. My foot tends to slip in the heal area and if I tighten up the laces to eliminate that slip, they are just too tight and overall uncomfortable. I have other shoes from Adidas and have not had any issues. I'm disappointed in the comfort of this style.
customer_reviews.author: brad from Wisconsin

customer_reviews.title: Great for my Bombers fan!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband because they're blue and gold, and he's a huge Winnipeg Blue Bombers fan and he absolutely loves them! He said they're comfortable, and the fit is great. They match his Bombers stuff perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Shallon L

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes perform well when I workout, and they have held up over time. The fit is just right. Additionally, their style is on-point.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff P.

customer_reviews.title: I like the look of these
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of these. They are very snug, which is great for working out but not as comfortable for casual wear.
customer_reviews.author: bjjjcr

customer_reviews.title: Good looks, nice color.
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad shoe for the price, but definitely not the most comfortable shoe either. Decent outsole, but lousy insole I.M.O.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Miller

customer_reviews.title: Addidas run small.
customer_reviews.text: If you wear a 11.5 you will want to get a 12 or 12.5. I am trying to stretch these out now with some success but they run at least a half size small.
customer_reviews.author: Peter D. Himmel

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable, great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They are very sturdy yet comfortable! Nice looking. I’ve been in the mud with them and it simply wipes right off. The white lining at the bottom of the shoe doesn’t stain. Awesome grip on the bottom too!
customer_reviews.author: Scott McFarland

customer_reviews.title: Looks super nice but.......,
customer_reviews.text: Fits and looks great but had to return for my ankle/heel feeling loose up and down the back of shoe. Look at the top of the shoe heel and that little u-shaped cutout is the problem . Looks super nice but....
customer_reviews.author: Miko

customer_reviews.title: Quality shoe and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I typically wear a different brand of but these Adidas are really comfortable and the blue color is rich. Price makes it a total win.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lapointe

customer_reviews.title: Hard shoes difficult to break
customer_reviews.text: I've been walking with these Adidas and I've found these are extremely hard to break. Left shoe is too tight, even losing the laces. Heels are too hard and tight.
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio Iannini

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great comfortable shoe. Love playing basketball in them even though they are low tops
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made and very comfortable. I mostly use for weight training and plyo
customer_reviews.text: Well made and very comfortable. I mostly use for weight training and plyo. Good cushioning - I wouldn't necessarily use these for long-distance running, but fine for a mile or two.
customer_reviews.author: MAK

customer_reviews.title: Good overall
customer_reviews.text: Like shoes overall, my son pulled the tab on back to put them on and it tire.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin G.

customer_reviews.title: Good looking
customer_reviews.text: Great looking my husband loved them he thinks they may run a little snug They are keepers!!! Great Fathers Day gift
customer_reviews.author: P. Mallard

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, and reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my 9 year old son, who is normally hard on shoes. I am shocked to say they are still in good shape, even after a summer of rough-housing.
customer_reviews.author: Deeeee

customer_reviews.title: These are the most comfortable shoes I've had in a long time
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable shoes I've had in a long time. So far I have 4 pair. Black, burgundy, red, and the white pair are on the way I've loved them
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne USMC Sessoms

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad shoe
customer_reviews.text: They initially had an odd fit to them but after wearing them for a bit felt comfortable. Was able to wear them all day without issues. I have issue with my feet and this shoe did not add to that issue.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Slippery when wet
customer_reviews.text: Best fitting shoe I've had for a while. Sole does not provide much traction on wet smooth concrete floors but everywhere else is fine
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Sent Back
customer_reviews.text: Nice colors but the shoes are very stiff. Not a good shoe to workout in. I sent them back but for some reason they came back to me.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Tate

customer_reviews.title: I bought them to use as cross trainers in the gym and so far they have been great. They look really sleek and cool
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in an 8.5 men's, I'm a 9.5 in women's and they fit perfectly! I bought them to use as cross trainers in the gym and so far they have been great. They look really sleek and cool, and you cant beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Weggeland

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed
customer_reviews.text: Shoes did not last as long as I think they should. Within a few months the inside of the shoe at the heel began pulling away and the inside layer was pulling out.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Great looking show, for a little bit smaller than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Chris F.

customer_reviews.title: Good sprint distance shoe
customer_reviews.text: Slips a little in the heal unless you really tie them tight. Otherwise comfortable, effective and cool looking.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Biasotti

customer_reviews.title: They look pretty nice in person
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are waaaaay too tight, and I ordered a size up. They look pretty nice in person. These are baseball trainers.
customer_reviews.author: M. Xanchex

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: Nice fit & comfortable but the inner lining wore out at the heal quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Mike McCormick

customer_reviews.title: Great kicks
customer_reviews.text: THese were perfect for my son. He loves them. They fit exactly as they should.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Call

customer_reviews.title: looks like a defective shoe not what I was lead to ...
customer_reviews.text: The stripes only on one side of shoe, looks like a defective shoe not what I was lead to believe I was purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Better Way

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: They were extremely too small. Order a half size up! So disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Daffenee James

customer_reviews.title: SSB Tournament in the ATL
customer_reviews.text: We wear this with my uniform this weekend in the ATL SSB tournament. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: DeMontro L. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Nice sneakers
customer_reviews.text: My son liked this shoes . I bought them for school that will start next week .
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Sharp Looking and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have been a coach for 10 years and worn all different brands. I love the look of these, but most importantly, they are extremely comfortable compared to my previous pair of NB. I would highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa La Masse

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: They fit a little tighter than normal, but overall a great training shoe.
customer_reviews.author: spencer reese

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: A tad more narrow than expected. I thought they would fit like my Nike trainers, but they're fine.
customer_reviews.author: AJay_89

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe all around!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe!!! Very comfortable. I wear this shoe for work and the gym. I’m a big guy and this shoe in a size 18 fits true to size. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Mcneill

customer_reviews.title: Little Tight
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are nice looking ...but fit alittle tight on the width.Hopefully they will wear in.
customer_reviews.author: Buzz

customer_reviews.title: Very hard, no flexibility
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoe but I ordered a half size smaller because most or the reviews said they ran larger. They were too small and have no flexibility. Kinda hurt to put on.
customer_reviews.author: heidid

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoes I have three different colors great for the gym whatever you’re doing
customer_reviews.author: Phife dogg

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I only wear Adidas and these are the least comfortable Adidas shoes I've ever worn.
customer_reviews.author: SDK

customer_reviews.title: Immediate return
customer_reviews.text: Immediate return. Pull tab on back of left shoe broken in box. Material tab is made of appears very cheap. Did not bother trying on. 2 stars for free return and refund
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, comfortable and well fit. The breathable material really works. Keeps my feet cool.
customer_reviews.author: Tan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love the shoe! great comfort and tons of compliments on the look and color.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan J. Mays

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Tow box is slightly bigger than expected but still a good fit
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: Starts off tight, but fits just about right
customer_reviews.text: Started off a little tight fit, but after 3 days of wear it fits great. Easy to break in and easy to wear. Only complaint would be that the heel seems a little short, so it seems like it would slip off a little too easy when running. However, it does have a nice feel and breathes through easily.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Norwood

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe but I was hoping it had a thicker sole
customer_reviews.author: Art Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Third time I wore the shoe, the back pull tab pulled clear off the shoe. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: I like the amount of cushion and the way they grip ...
customer_reviews.text: Shows fit as expected. I like the amount of cushion and the way they grip my feet. Would definitely recommend to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Scott Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great turf shoes my son uses them at indoor practice and when pitching on a no cleat mound.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: A good casual comfy shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great as a casual shoes but not good for sports.
customer_reviews.author: marie

customer_reviews.title: Adidas Rock
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe! Comfortable rugged. Sons second pair. Uses them for training.
customer_reviews.author: mamamoffitt

customer_reviews.title: Too much heal movement
customer_reviews.text: Returned, heal did not have enough curve to hold my heal firmly when walking for me. Purchased some EQT Support Mid ADV Primeknit Shoes from Adidas that fit much better.
customer_reviews.author: Cook

customer_reviews.title: ... in is rough but once thats done it fits fine.
customer_reviews.text: Break in is rough but once thats done it fits fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sharalyn

customer_reviews.title: Quality shoe at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality shoe that fits perfect and provides great support. Love the arch support. I also appreciate the reinforced toe area to make it a little stronger than the rest of the mesh-like material on the top of the shoe. Adidas is stepping up their game.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good and supportive shoe requiring hardly any break in at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way too big
customer_reviews.text: Huge compared to the same shoe size in a different brand. Easily returned though.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin B. Good

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The size is 1/2 larger than expected. The edge of the shoes hurt as well
customer_reviews.author: WYF

customer_reviews.title: Shoe fits too small and it tore my feet up
customer_reviews.text: I literally could not walk for two days. I had a sore on top of my second toe and they essentially disintegrated the toe of the sock on the other foot.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Durden

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, great price
customer_reviews.text: Took a few trips to the gym before they broke in, a little stiff at first.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoes look great real great. I think I will order another pair.
customer_reviews.author: gmoney

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son. Great fit. Look very nice.
customer_reviews.author: A. M. King

customer_reviews.title: She loved the way the looked and
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were true to size, my daughter wears a size 7w and 5m. She loved the way the looked and felt
customer_reviews.author: Lori Plata

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for working out
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, solid construction, appealing look. Took about a week and a half of gym use to break them in. I'll probably get another pair when these wear out, but it looks like they'll last for quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Guisinger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and comfortable shoe. Plenty of room in the toe box and good support for the arches.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I feel so comfortable wearing it during my daily workout.
customer_reviews.author: Noni O. Baylon

customer_reviews.title: Baseball trainer
customer_reviews.text: Thought I was buying a running shoe! But I’m pleased with the sturdy trainer I can wear to the gym and for casual.
customer_reviews.author: David E. Porter

customer_reviews.title: For the price they were okay. But in the ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price they were okay. But in the back area there is a part in side the shoe that runs the tendon.
customer_reviews.author: 87fierospyder

customer_reviews.title: fit great. Comfortable but to early to judge durability
customer_reviews.text: Wear 12 and that is what I ordered...fit great. Comfortable but to early to judge durability.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my 7th buy of Adidas' Speed Cross Trainer Models
customer_reviews.author: Benedicto C Go

customer_reviews.title: Over all theyvare comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like the fit..reinforced toe area..feel..although the mesh material makes for hard cleaning..dusty fields seem to stick to the material
customer_reviews.author: alfred pilotto

customer_reviews.title: These are just about the most comfortable shoes that I have ever had on my feet
customer_reviews.text: These are just about the most comfortable shoes that I have ever had on my feet. I will be buying another or two, or three in different colors maybe.
customer_reviews.author: Cornelius Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love the color. Shoe is comfortable and fits perfectly. Quality made
customer_reviews.author: andrew lindstrom

customer_reviews.title: looks beautiful and a little bit tight at thef irst time
customer_reviews.text: looks beautiful and a little bit tight at thef irst time. but it become comfortable after using it a couple of times
customer_reviews.author: ggccxx

customer_reviews.title: Lite and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Use to always wear Adidas but over the years quality suffered, but im glad ibought these. Got yhe black and blue colors. Extremely happy with the fit and comfort. Great workout shoes!
customer_reviews.author: ROB

product_meta.title: adidas Men's 5-Star Mid Football Shoe
product_meta.description: These men's half cut football boots are the lightest in the game. The SPRINTSKIN upper gives you support without adding bulk, and the TPU fly plate outsole provides traction for a strong ground play. A moulded insole absorbs shock while bursting towards the end zone.
